APP_ID.description: The GitHub App ID, find this at https://github.com/settings/apps.

PRIVATE_KEY.description: The contents of the private key for your GitHub App. See https://developer.github.com/apps/building-github-apps/authenticating-with-github-apps/#generating-a-private-key.

WEBHOOK_SECRET.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of webhook requests. The value of this should also be set in the GitHub App at https://github.com/settings/apps.

LOG_LEVEL.description: The verbosity of logs to show when running your app, which can be trace, debug, info, warn, error, or fatal.

SENTRY_DSN.description: Set to a Sentry DSN to report all errors thrown.
